turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a pizza ordered from papa johns for pick up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like me to order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a supreme pizza but without the sausage

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size pizza do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: traditional crust or something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the traditional crust is fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it well done or just cooked normally?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cooked normally

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And you need to have this ready as soon as possible?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what location did you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The papa johns on Horizon ridge in Henderson, nv

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I'll go ahead and place that order for you let me make sure I have it right, large supreme with no sausage, traditional crust, normal bake?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything sides or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the pizza thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, the order has been placed and will be ready for pick up in about twenty five minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sent the receipt to your phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!
